plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: TextSwapper
plugins.description:
Features


Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes in Figma.

Quickly update text without needing extra tools.

Streamlined text replacement for multiple objects, components, and frames.

Simple and intuitive interface for seamless integration with your workflow.

Save time ⏰ and eliminate the hassle of manually editing text in Figma!

How:


Add the word "page" to the name of your page frame (e.g., agreement_page).

Enter the text you want to replace in the "Find text" field (e.g., {company name}).

Enter the new text in the "Replace with" field (e.g., Figma).

Use the "Update" button to replace the specified line, or the "Update All" button to replace all occurrences of the text in your document.

Use the + and - buttons to adjust the number of text fields.

Click Save to store your list of text replacements for faster updates when working on the same document.

Use Load to retrieve your saved list of text replacements and automatically fill in the fields. The current version retrieves only the latest saved list.

Click Download Selected Pages as PDF to download the selected pages as one merged PDF file.
plugins.tagline: Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes—no extra tools needed.

plugins.name: md格式转设计稿 Markdown to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to convert Markdown text into fully structured Figma frames automatically, enhancing design workflows and documentation processes.


Function Description

The plugin parses Markdown syntax and creates corresponding Figma frames and text elements, supporting headings, lists, bold text, and horizontal rules. It ensures that all content is visually organized according to Markdown structuring.


Usage Method

Simply input your Markdown text into the provided text area in the plugin’s UI and click the ‘Convert Markdown’ button. The formatted content will appear as structured frames within your current Figma file.


Note

Ensure all text is properly formatted in Markdown before conversion. The frame width is fixed at 500px, but the height will adjust according to the content.


介绍

此插件允许用户将Markdown文本自动转换成完全结构化的Figma框架，增强设计工作流程和文档处理过程。


功能说明

插件解析Markdown语法，并创建相应的Figma框架和文本元素，支持标题、列表、加粗文本和水平规则。它确保所有内容都按照Markdown的结构进行视觉组织。


使用方法

只需在插件的用户界面中提供的文本区域中输入您的Markdown文本，然后点击“转换Markdown”按钮。格式化的内容将以结构化框架的形式出现在您当前的Figma文件中。


注意事项

确保在转换前所有文本都正确格式化为Markdown。框架宽度固定为500px，但高度将根据内容调整。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Transform Markdown into Structured Figma Frames

plugins.name: batchy
plugins.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
plugins.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

123462.release_notes:
v1.2.2

**Bug fixes**
🪲 top-level frame export fixed
🪲 there was an issue when using the same token multiple times

**Additional changes**
✅ tokens now use a $ in the beginning instead of curly brackets in the beginning and the end. Example {{file}} --> $file
✅ $layerName token is now called $layer
✅ $userName token is now called $user

plugins.name: PrevGen
plugins.description:
PREVGEN - MICROSTOCK PREVIEW GENERATOR

=======================================


🎯 WHAT IS PREVGEN?

PrevGen is a specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for microstock creators who need to generate hundreds of design previews quickly and efficiently. Stop spending hours creating mockups one by one - automate your entire preview generation workflow.


⚡ HOW IT WORKS:

1. CREATE TEMPLATE

- Design your preview template in Figma

- Use built-in templates (Freepik, Envato, DepositPhotos formats)

- Mark container layers for your designs


2. UPLOAD DESIGNS

- Drag & drop PNG, JPG, SVG files

- Auto-trim PNG transparency (optional)

- Batch process multiple files


3. CONFIGURE LAYOUT

- Choose: Horizontal, Vertical, or Grid layout

- Auto-spacing and alignment

- Fit or Fill image scaling options


4. CUSTOMIZE CONTENT

- Auto-replace text with filenames

- Apply custom colors to layers

- Bulk background color changes


5. GENERATE PREVIEWS

- Mass generate all previews instantly

- Auto-naming with prefix/suffix options

- Perfect positioning and spacing


✨ KEY FEATURES:

===============

- TEMPLATE SYSTEM - Built-in templates for major microstock platforms

- BATCH PROCESSING - Upload and process multiple designs at once

- AUTO LAYOUT - Smart positioning with customizable spacing

- TEXT AUTOMATION - Auto-replace text layers with design names

- COLOR MAPPING - Apply custom colors to specific layers

- PNG OPTIMIZATION - Auto-trim transparent areas

- FLEXIBLE SCALING - Fit or Fill image modes

- BULK OPERATIONS - Generate hundreds of previews in one click


🎨 SUPPORTED FORMATS:

====================

- PNG (with transparency trimming)

- JPG/JPEG


📐 BUILT-IN TEMPLATES:

=====================

- Freepik: Landscape (4500×3000), Portrait (3000×4500), Square (3500×3500)

- Envato Elements: Main Image (2340×1560), Secondary (2340×1500)

- DepositPhotos: Landscape (4500×3000), Portrait (3000×4500), Square (3500×3500)


🚀 PERFECT FOR:

===============

- Stock designers creating portfolio previews

- Microstock contributors preparing submissions

- Design agencies showcasing client work

- Freelancers building presentation materials

- Anyone needing bulk design mockups


💡 USE CASES:

=============

- Create portfolio previews for Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, Getty Images

- Generate client presentation mockups

- Build design showcase galleries

- Prepare submission previews for stock platforms

- Automate repetitive design tasks


🎯 WHO BENEFITS:

===============

- Microstock photographers and designers

- Stock content contributors

- Digital design agencies

- Freelance graphic designers

- Portfolio creators


💝 PRICING:

===========

100% FREE for microstock creators and designers

No hidden fees, no subscriptions, no limitations


🛠️ TECHNICAL SPECS:

==================

- Works with Figma Desktop and Web

- No external dependencies

- Processes files locally (secure)

- Supports unlimited file uploads

- Auto-saves plugin settings


📞 SUPPORT & CONTACT:

====================

- Bug Reports: yasadesign.work@gmail.com


💖 SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT:

======================

Love PrevGen? Support continued development:

PayPal


Thanks for

YASA Design Studio
plugins.tagline: Generate Microstock Previews in Seconds, Not Hours

plugins.name: SPLOC - Selected the parent of component layer
plugins.description:
A plugin for Figma that automatically selects the parent component when any child within the component or its instance is selected.


Main features:

  1. Automatic detection and selection of the parent component
  2. Automatic collapse of the selected component
  3. On/Off switch to enable/disable functionality
  4. Memories the last selection to prevent cyclic selections


How to use:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Launch the plugin (it is active by default)
  3. Select any element within the component or its instance
  4. The plugin will automatically:
  5. Finds the parent component
  6. Select it
  7. Flattens the structure of the component


Interface:

  1. Compact window with ON/OFF switch
  2. The switch allows you to temporarily disable plugin functionality


Technical features:

  1. Works with components (COMPONENT) and their instances (INSTANCE)
  2. Prevents cyclic selections
  3. Optimized for working with large files
  4. Minimal impact on Figma performance


Application:

Ideal for working with large component systems where switching between children and parent components is often required.


----------------------------------------



Плагин для Figma, который автоматически выделяет родительский компонент при выборе любого дочернего элемента внутри компонента или его экземпляра.


Основные возможности:

  1. Автоматическое определение и выбор родительского компонента
  2. Автоматическое схлопывание (collapse) выбранного компонента
  3. Переключатель On/Off для включения/отключения функционала
  4. Запоминание последнего выбора для предотвращения циклических выделений


Как использовать:

  1. Установите плагин
  2. Запустите плагин (он активен по умолчанию)
  3. Выберите любой элемент внутри компонента или его экземпляра
  4. Плагин автоматически:
  5. Найдет родительский компонент
  6. Выделит его
  7. Схлопнет структуру компонента


Интерфейс:

  1. Компактное окно с переключателем ON/OFF
  2. Переключатель позволяет временно отключить функционал плагина


Технические особенности:

  1. Работает с компонентами (COMPONENT) и их экземплярами (INSTANCE)
  2. Предотвращает циклические выделения
  3. Оптимизирован для работы с большими файлами
  4. Минимальное влияние на производительность Figma

plugins.name: Frame Flow
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Frame Flow” allows you to duplicate the selected frame to the right or below with a predefined spacing. In addition to duplication, it also lets you insert blank frames at custom intervals. It’s especially useful when creating presentation documents, as it helps you add pages smoothly without disrupting the layout spacing. Setting up keyboard shortcuts is highly recommended for efficient use.


New Frame

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size.


Add Frame Right

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size to the right of the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + → (Right Arrow)


Add Frame Below

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size below the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Right

Duplicates the currently selected frame to the right.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + → (Right Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Below

Duplicates the currently selected frame below.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Settings

Configure various parameters.




Figmaプラグイン「Frame Flow」は、選択中のフレームを、事前に設定した間隔で右隣や下に複製できるプラグインです。複製のみではなく、白紙のフレームを好きな間隔で配置することも可能です。主に資料作成時、ページの間隔を崩さずスムーズにページを増やしていきたい時に活躍します。ショートカットを設定するのがおすすめです。


New Frame

設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。


Add Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + →(右矢印)です。


Add Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + →(右矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Settings

様々な値を設定します。
plugins.tagline: Quickly layout 1920x1080 frames

plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

plugins.name: Sparkle Design Theme Settings
plugins.description:
Sparkle Designに興味はあるけど、自分のプロジェクトに合うだろうか...そんな不安を抱えていませんか？

Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの利用者が更にいいデザインを生み出すことをサポートするプラグインです。


Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの高い品質を維持しながらも複雑なVariablesの編集や面倒なドキュメントの更新を自動で実行するため、Sparkle Designを簡単に任意のスタイルにカスタマイズできます。


現在は以下の3つのテーマのカスタマイズに対応しています。


Primary Color

プライマリカラーを好みの色に設定できます。グレーもプライマリカラーを反映した配色が自動で反映されるため、UI全体のトーンを維持しながらのカスタマイズが可能です！


Font Family

monospaceとproportionalのそれぞれのフォントファミリーを設定できます。対応フォントはすべてGoogle Fontsに収録されているため、開発時もスムーズな連携が可能です。


Border Radius

角丸のサイズを設定できます。UIの要素ごとに異なるサイズの角丸がすべて同期的に変化するため、それぞれの角丸が持つ意味を残しながらもUIの印象を変更できます。


※ Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Design専用のプラグインです。Sparkle Design上でご利用ください。


Sparkle Designについて

  1. https://sparkle-design.goodpatch.com/
  2. Sparkle Design for Figma


グッドパッチについて

グッドパッチは顧客体験を起点に企業変革を前進させるデザインカンパニーです。

https://goodpatch.com/
plugins.tagline: Sparkle Designのテーマ編集ツール

plugins.name: 10x HTML | Design to clean responsive code 10x faster
plugins.description:
⚡️ Instantly turn your Figma design into clean, responsive HTML / CSS / SCSS

🚀 No registration, no paywall, click and get your code

🔍 Preview / inspect the generated code in Figma

⚡️ Test responsiveness and make live adjustments

🎓 Smart layout and naming



Who is it for ?


  1. Beginner looking to turn a design into a website starting from a clean structure where 90% of the work is already handled


  1. Advanced front-end developers looking to drastically speed up their workflow without compromising on the structure and readability of their code.


No registration required - run the plugin, select a frame and preview the result in a single click.

Works in design mode only (for now, but let us know if you're interested for dev mode)



What is 10x HTML ?


Most design-to-code tools generate bloated or messy output, with non optimized layout.

That’s because extracting logic from a visual design — especially an unstructured one — is a hard problem..


10x HTML was built from the ground up with the clear goal of solving those issues with smart rules and layout inference.


We focus on :

- Understanding layout intent

- Reducing unnecessary nesting

- Recognizing repeated patterns (even copy-pasted ones)

- Grouping elements intelligently

- and more...


10x HTML doesn't claim to replace a frontend developer — but it dramatically accelerates your workflow by giving you clean, factorized and structured code that you can build on.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced front-end developer, 10xHTML is designed to handle most of the heavy lifting for you—making smart assumptions when needed and delivering perfect code with clear naming and structure that’s easy to build upon.


Clean, semantic code – without the mess

- Converts buttons, inputs, headers, and more into proper HTML elements

- Uses a smart class system: base classes, modifiers, and utilities based on context

- Picks optimized class names

- Flattens overly nested layers


Smart, responsive export

- Fully responsive by default — includes media and container queries

- Detects and links similar elements, even without components

- Intelligently groups and infers layout, even from unstructured designs


Live code and layout inspection

- Preview the final webpage right in Figma

- Test responsiveness

- Do live update to adjust the code

- Download the code and get ready for production


How to reach out ?

💬 Request support here

💡 Suggest an improvement here

🕷 Report a bug here

🚀 Join our Discord for support, feedback or questions..


⚠️ Note :

10x HTML is currently free and fully accessible as a Beta version.

We are trying to gather as much feedback as possible, so please feel free to post any kind of comments (bug report, idea, opinion...)

Once we reach the level of maturity we’re aiming for, we will switch to a paid model

(with very reasonable pricing)

plugins.name: Node Exporter
plugins.description:
🧩 Node Exporter


Node Exporter is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you extract full or partial JSON data from selected design nodes — including all their children — with just a click.


✨ Features


- 🔍 Inspect any selected nodes in your Figma file

- 🧾 Export all node properties (deep scan via prototype chain)

- ✅ Or choose specific common properties to extract (e.g., name, width, layoutMode)

- 🌳 Recursively includes children of selected nodes

- 💾 Outputs clean, downloadable `.json` files

- ⚡️ Fast, no setup, no code required


---


🚀 How to Use


1. Install the plugin from Figma Community

2. Open your Figma or FigJam file

3. Select one or more nodes

4. Right-click → Plugins → Node Exporter

5. You'll see two options:

- `✨ Export All Properties`: grabs every readable property for all selected nodes and children

- `🔧 Choose Properties to Export`: shows a checkbox list of common properties you can include

6. Click the relevant button and a `.json` file will automatically download!


---


📦 Example Use Cases


- Design-to-code workflows

- Creating component libraries

- Auditing design system properties

- JSON handoff for frontend developers

- Custom design analysis


---


🔐 Permissions


Node Exporter does not require any network access or authentication. All processing is done locally in your editor.


---


🧠 Tech Notes


- Uses JavaScript reflection to walk the prototype chain

- Safe error handling (non-serializable properties skipped)

- Deep export support for nested `children` arrays


---


👨‍💻 Developer Info


Created by Agent Null

Have ideas, feedback or bugs? Open an issue or contribute!
plugins.tagline: Extract all or selected node properties as JSON, including children — quick, clean, and magical!

plugins.name: Frame Navigator
plugins.description:
🧭 FrameNavigator


Effortlessly navigate large and complex Figma files with FrameNavigator — a floating Table of Contents plugin that helps you stay organized and move between frames in a single click.


✨ Key Features


- Quick Navigation

Instantly jump to any frame from a floating panel that stays visible while you work.


- Custom Frame Registration

Select frames directly on the canvas and add them to your TOC with a simple "+" button.


- Group Organization

Organize your frames into custom groups for better structure and clarity—perfect for managing multiple screens.


- Flexible Panel Sizes

Choose between default, compact, and full views to match your workflow and screen space.


---


🛠 How It Works


  1. Register a Frame: Select a frame on the Figma canvas and click the `+` button in the plugin to add it to the TOC.
  2. Create a Group: Hover over ungrouped frames in the TOC and click the appearing checkbox to select them. Then click the Create Group button at the top of the panel to group them.
  3. Add to Existing Group: Select a group first, then select a new frame on the canvas and click `+` to add the frame into that group.
  4. Rename a Group: Double-click on a group name to edit it.
  5. Remove a Group: Right-click on a group and select **Remove Group**. ⚠️ Note: All frames inside that group will also be removed from the TOC.
  6. Reorder Frames: Drag and drop frames (or groups) within the TOC to change their order.


---


Perfect for design system creators, large prototyping flows, or anyone managing multi-screen layouts in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly jump between frames with a floating table of contents. Easily build your own TOC.

plugins.name: Frames to Auto Layout
plugins.description:
We’ve all done it–selected multiple frames and tried to add auto layout to each of them, only to find that instead of adding auto layout to every frame individually as expected, Figma annoyingly groups all your selected frames and organizes them in a single auto layout.


This simple plugin provides that missing, expected functionality for Figma. With this plugin, simply select all of the frames you want to add auto layout to and run the plugin, and voila—every frame you selected will now have auto layout added, instead of the default Figma behavior of grouping the selected frames within a new frame and organizing your selected layers in a single auto layout—so annoying!


Currently the plugin simply sets the same default auto layout properties that the standard "add auto layout" UI button and command add—horizontal directionality and 10px padding and spacing. I may consider adding to this plugin the ability to configure custom default properties with a separate command—please comment if such a feature would interest you.

accepted.name: Avana Vana
accepted.description:
Senior Product Designer & Full-stack Developer

Currently Design Lead at Co:Create (www.cocreate.ink)

plugins.tagline: Add auto layout to multiple frames individually, instantly.

plugins.name: RTL智能适配助手 RTL Auto Adapt Helper
plugins.description:
介绍

本插件可帮助设计师一键启用或关闭组件的“阿语”属性，用于快速适配阿拉伯语等 RTL（从右至左）语言界面。支持自动识别并批量设置所选节点及其子组件的变量值，提高国际化效率。


功能说明

  1. 自动查找所选组件中的“阿语”变量属性
  2. 一键切换阿语属性值为 on 或 off
  3. 实时统计处理成功和失败的组件数量
  4. 支持递归处理嵌套结构与实例组件


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选中一个或多个组件或画板
  2. 打开插件界面
  3. 点击“启用阿语模式”或“关闭阿语模式”按钮
  4. 查看统计信息，确认处理结果


注意事项

  1. 插件仅处理存在“阿语”变量属性的组件
  2. 若组件未设置该属性，将不会被修改
  3. 暂不支持自动创建属性，请先在组件中配置好“阿语”变量


Introduction

This plugin helps designers quickly toggle the "arabic" component variable on or off, enabling fast RTL layout adaptation for Arabic language support. It recursively updates selected nodes and their nested components for efficient internationalization.


Function Description

  1. Auto-detect components with "arabic" property
  2. Toggle the value between on and off
  3. Recurse through selected frames, groups, and instances
  4. Display real-time stats on successful and failed updates


How to Use

  1. Select one or more frames or components in your Figma file
  2. Launch the plugin
  3. Click “Enable Arabic Mode” or “Disable Arabic Mode”
  4. View results in the summary section


Notes

  1. Only components that already have an "arabic" variable will be updated
  2. The plugin does not create new properties — please define them first
  3. Works best when your design system is RTL-ready

注意事项

  1. 插件仅处理存在“阿语”变量属性的组件
  2. 若组件未设置该属性，将不会被修改
  3. 暂不支持自动创建属性，请先在组件中配置好“阿语”变量


Introduction

This plugin helps designers quickly toggle the "arabic" component variable on or off, enabling fast RTL layout adaptation for Arabic language support. It recursively updates selected nodes and their nested components for efficient internationalization.


Function Description

  1. Auto-detect components with "arabic" property
  2. Toggle the value between on and off
  3. Recurse through selected frames, groups, and instances
  4. Display real-time stats on successful and failed updates


How to Use

  1. Select one or more frames or components in your Figma file
  2. Launch the plugin
  3. Click “Enable Arabic Mode” or “Disable Arabic Mode”
  4. View results in the summary section


Notes

  1. Only components that already have an "arabic" variable will be updated
  2. The plugin does not create new properties — please define them first
  3. Works best when your design system is RTL-ready

plugins.name: ShadeSmith – AI Palette Generator
plugins.description:
ShadeSmith is a Figma plugin that helps designers and developers instantly create scalable color palettes from a single base color (500-level).

It automatically generates tints, shades, and tonal variations using intelligent color logic. Whether you’re working on a design system, branding kit, or just experimenting, ShadeSmith ensures visually consistent and WCAG-compliant palettes with every click.


✨ Features:

•Start from any hex/RGB/base color

•Instantly generate tints (100–400) and shades (600–900)

•Accessible contrast suggestions built-in

•Copy-ready output for Figma styles, Tailwind tokens, or CSS

•Customizable intensity and range sliders


Perfect for:

•Design systems

•Theming

•Light/dark mode variants

•Rapid prototyping

accepted.description: I am a design leader with demonstrated expertise and experience of leading and delivering new product innovation, forming strategic design directions.

plugins.name: NornAI - Boost Your Design and Content with AI
plugins.description:
🔮 NornAI: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to transform and adapt your texts, adjusting tone and style to create unique and engaging designs. Inspired by mythology, this plugin offers a magical and personalized experience.




✨ Key Features


Text transformation with predefined tones: standard, success, error, call to action, and more.

Quick suggestions to summarize, expand, simplify, and make text more persuasive or friendly.

Image search and insertion with a special themed interface.



🛠️ How to Use


1. Text Transformation

  1. Select the desired text.
  2. Choose a voice tone or quick suggestion.
  3. Use custom prompts for specific instructions.
  4. Click on one of the generated alternatives to apply.



2. Image Search

  1. Access the "Images" tab.
  2. Enter your search and optionally select a color filter.
  3. Click on an image to insert it into the project.

plugins.name: Size Sync
plugins.description:
A convenient plugin for aligning sizes of multiple selected objects. Easily batch resize objects to match maximum/minimum widths or heights. Compatible with various objects including groups, frames, and shapes. Streamline your layout with 4 simple commands. Set up shortcuts for even faster workflow. Perfect for when you just need to match sizes without specifying exact width values - simple and efficient.


複数のオブジェクトを選択して、サイズを簡単に揃えることができるプラグインです。最大/最小の幅や高さに合わせて一括リサイズが可能です。グループ、フレーム、シェイプなど、様々なオブジェクトに対応しています。4つのコマンドで素早くレイアウトを整えることができます。ショートカットを設定することでクイックな作業を実現します。widthを数値で指定する必要がなく、ただ同じサイズに揃えたいだけのときに便利です。
plugins.tagline: Quick shortcuts for object size alignment.
